message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $18,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $18,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $16,500. I believe this price reflects the true worth of what you're getting.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,000 for the product.
